# TTRPG Asset Generation Prompt

## Core Structure
[Asset Type: map]
[Game System: D&D 5e]
[Intended Use: VTT and Print reference]

## Detailed Description
Subject: Depth Zones and Altitude Bands
Environment: encounter space with clear tactical layout
Style: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), unified painterly collection style, grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, hand-painted top-down with clear grid, merged-zone aesthetic, reality fractures, hybrid aquatic-sky motifs
Technical Requirements: grid 15x15 squares at 140 DPI (70 px per 5 ft minimum, 140 px preferred), aspect 1:1, resolution 1024x1024
Palette: teal/indigo blends, storm gold accents

## Functional Elements (for maps)
- Tactical Features: multiple paths and choke points, elevation changes, overlay symbology + legend, cover options
- Scale: 15x15 squares, each square = 5 feet
- Clarity: bold lines for walls/obstacles; fine lines for textures; consistent terrain patterns

## Visual Specifications
- Lighting: studio
- Detail Level: high detail for zoom, simplified for overview
- Composition: rule of thirds with clear focal points and visual flow

## Practical Considerations
- Must be readable at intended viewing size
- No embedded text labels; use icons and clear linework only. Reserve clean margins and text-safe areas for VTT overlays. Render grid and numeric ticks crisply; avoid stylized fonts entirely. Zero rasterized words.
- Avoid embedded text unless specified; prefer iconography and numbered pins

## Negatives
- nonsense text, watermarks, captions, signatures, artist names; modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare; overly sexualized or glamorized portrayal

Think deeply about creating an asset that enhances gameplay immersion while maintaining practical usability for TTRPG sessions.
